Class CdTariffManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.CdTariffManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICdTariffManager

    public class CdTariffManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICdTariffManager
    This class implements ICdTariffManager. Train connection is retreaved using ƒçd web search engine.

      • getAdvancedGroupTariffs

        public CdTickets getAdvancedGroupTariffs(int adultsCount,
                                int childrenCounts,
                                boolean weekendOnly,
                                int hours)
        Get advanced type of group ticket. These tickets are stored in xml db.
        Specified by:
        getAdvancedGroupTariffs in interface ICdTariffManager
        Parameters:
        adultsCount - count of adults
        childrenCounts - count of children
        weekendOnly - ticket is allowed only on weekends
        hours - time of the path in hours
        Returns:
        CdTickets for the path with the best params (e.g. lowest price)
